Tongmenghui, Sun Yat-sen's alliance for democracy, founded 1905, became the Guomindang 國民黨|国民党 in 1912

sentences.english: In 1906 he met Mr. Sun Yat-sen in Japan and joined the Chinese Revolutionary League.
sentences.chinese: 1906年他在日本得会孙中山，并加入同盟会。

sentences.english: The Bashu United League is an organization of people from Sichuan Province in China and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 巴蜀同盟会是由海内外四川人组成的组织。

sentences.english: If this is the case, where did the Ba-Shu United League obtain its numbers?
sentences.chinese: 这是实情，那么巴蜀同盟会的数据又是如何得出的呢？

sentences.english: Once more, her allies will give rise to the thought of life anew.
sentences.chinese: 再一次，她的同盟会重新给于生命的想法。

sentences.english: Passion is the true nature of God, so does our Second Fight Alliance.
sentences.chinese: 激情，是上帝的本色，也是咱二战同盟会的宗旨。

definition: anti-Qing revolutionary party set up in 1904 under Cai Yuanpei 蔡元培/same as 復古會|复古会
Tongmenghui, Sun Yat-sen's alliance for democracy, founded 1905, became the Guomindang 國民黨|国民党 in 1912
Revive China Society, founded by Dr Sun Yat-sen 孫中山|孙中山 in 1894 in Honolulu
opposing Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯 in War of national protection 1915-1916/same as 反袁鬥爭|反袁斗争
anti-Qing revolutionary party set up in Changsha by 黃興|黄兴[Huang2 Xing1] in 1904, a precursor of Sun Yat-sen's Alliance for Democracy 同盟會|同盟会[Tong2 meng2 hui4] and of the Guomindang
second revolution/campaign from 1913 of the provisional revolutionary government (under Sun Yat-sen and the Guomindang) against Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯 and the Northern Warlords
anti-Qing secret societies
Song Jiaoren (1882-1913), politician of the revolutionary party involved in the 1911 Xinhai revolution, murdered in Shanghai in 1913
late-Qing underground resistance movement against the Qing dynasty
Wuchang Uprising of October 10th, 1911, which led to Sun Yat-sen's Xinhai Revolution and the fall of the Qing dynasty
National protection war or Campaign to defend the republic (1915), a rebellion against the installation of Yuan Shikai as emperor
Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Guomintang 國民黨|国民党/same as 孫逸仙|孙逸仙
National Protection Army of 1915 (in rebellion against Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯[Yuan2 Shi4 kai3])
the Northern Warlords (1912-1927)
